website_summaries.verdict: The Philips 19DP6QJNS is a unique two-in-one monitor that's designed to maximize your desk space. It offers plenty of connectivity options over two different screens, but each screen maxes out at a 1,280-by-1,024 resolution.
pros: Unique, stylish design saves on space

customer_reviews.title: NOT HDMI ONLY VGA BUY ELSE WHERE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the item the day i got it as it states in the listing hdmi ready with hdmi input picture but this item is not hdmi at all it only has vga connection so returned for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Trickz0

customer_reviews.title: if you see a dead pixel don't wait!
customer_reviews.text: it came with one dead pixel, I didn't want return it back because I don't have any other screen and return such a big thing for a tiny detail sounds like too much trouble for me, with the time I regretted that decision because the screen is big but I'm looking that tiny pixel all time, now it is late, just bad luck I guess. Sometimes I take a beer and look that dead pixel for hours, it make me thing about the live, the screen must have millions of pixels, but I only know one, the dead one.
customer_reviews.author: pau Fer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre monitor at an attractive price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this one: cheap build with a wobbly plastic stand and the sort of picture quality that prompts you to try and adjust the angle of the monitor every time you move your head. The monitor cannot display a black, not even a uniform grey, and the viewing angle is very limited. Two stars because it was cheap and worked straightaway with my Raspberry Pi. Had to return it as I knew I would feel sorry for purchasing it every time I turn it on. Bought instead a Benq GW2406Z for £45 more, which I am very happy with so far, deep blacks, very wide viewing angle, stable metal stand.
customer_reviews.author: Miss C J Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Colour is very washed out
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with how quickly this arrived. I ordered two screens to work from home. I was immediately unhappy with the colour when I turned it on. It's extremely washed out. I played around with the colour balance for a good hour before giving and accepting that this is just how it looks. I have one screen working in VGA and the other in HDMI as that is what my docking station can support. The HDMI connection is vastly better with these screens. I haven't ever noticed that with the Dell monitors I use in work. It will do and value for money wasn't bad, but I know it will irk me in time.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great product, low price
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it should do, at a decent price. Two inputs (DVI and HDMI) and a 2 year warranty. Has it’s own drivers, but are not needed, quite literally plug in and use.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I did not read the comments I needed a monitor to connect to my laptop so I can extend the screen. I received this order and to my horror it has a VGA port not an HDMI port. I was disgusted that this advert would deceive people and state it has a HDMI port but doesn’t. Come on its 2020 a monitor should at least have that. I will not be buying from Philips again and I have started the process for my return
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Can't really complain, paid £57 for it. Bargin really. Only VGA but never the less, it fits it's purpose and does have good image clarity. Definite buy if you're looking for something this size. This is used for games and desktop and really does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: VGA only & special setup for Mac
customer_reviews.text: This is a small, light & perfectly adequate monitor, just right for use where space is limited. I was misled by the description into believing it had HDMI connection. It doesn't. Only VGA. I also struggled for 3 days , with the help of 3 Philips advisors to try to link it to my new Mac Mini until the last one told me it couldn't be done & I should send it back. I phoned Apple Support & 5 minutes later it was working. I have passed the info to Philips Support.
customer_reviews.author: Bazzy

customer_reviews.title: Does simple graphics well
customer_reviews.text: Bought to go with old xp computer, only requirement that it displays text and photos well, which it does. Can't comment on suitability for other uses. Limited connectivity but as I only need VGA not a problem. Good for what I need but probably too low spec for other uses. Good price for limited use monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Anttrim

customer_reviews.title: Great for all desktop PC purposes
customer_reviews.text: No complaints whatsoever. Extremely lightweight, adjustable screen tilt and high quality display for video watching, gaming and work. Setup was simple and the stand required no extra parts/screws and fitted to the monitor with no issues. It was as simple as clicking it in place. No HDMI input however, so this may not be suitable for all purposes (e.g inputs from many laptops/consoles), but for a main desktop PC this is a good monitor at a competitive price point.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need a TV, I just needed a big screen with HDMI input to watch online movies and series and as a second screen for my laptop at my cozy place without spending hundreds of pounds for one. Picture quality is amazing and has it's own stand so it's easy to install and use right away. Both UK and European power connectors to help you feel safe with your purchase without worrying of buying adapters. The only low-quality thing is the sound, however, I was not looking for one anyways and you can plug in your own home stereo. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Wanted cheap and quick replacement
customer_reviews.text: My monitor kaput itself without warning and I wanted a replacement quickly. I bought this from Amazon Warehouse as being in 'good' condition. And it was. It does the job and the price was a good discount from new. It is extremely light and 'plastic'. But the colours are ok (albeit not great) and I am pleased with it although if I had paid more for it I probably wouldn't be as happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kessie

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They do the job as a basic requirement, I do need more equipment as they do not connect together for a multi screen display as planned as they are not basic compatible
customer_reviews.author: emiel

customer_reviews.title: Really sharp screen
customer_reviews.text: I run a Mac Mini 2012 (late) and was using a 21" screen, decided to upgrade. Got this screen expecting just a bigger version of my old one - but no, this has got a really good 1080p image with really vivid and strong colours. I wach a few films on this from about 6mt away, till good quality and viewing angle. Mainly run OS X on it and works well with Mini display to HDMI (need an adapter) - works with HDMI audio to built in speakers
customer_reviews.author: Sam Styles

customer_reviews.title: light
customer_reviews.text: picture is indistinct when in direct light unless shaded .N ot up to the standard of my earlier Philips mod
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: monitor
customer_reviews.text: It does the job that it was intended for. Lovely color. Easy to set up. We have had no problem at all with it. Perfect picture quality. I have put 1 star for gaming. I can't justify any stars in this category as we don't game. We purely use it as a monitor for the pc. Nice size, flat screen. Perfect for us.Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: magical flower

customer_reviews.title: Screen OK, but wrong plug.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is fine - does what it says on the box... One point. The monitor came with a euro-plug power cable, not a UK-plug power cable. I still had the cable from the previous monitor, so in practical terms not a real issue for me: but it could have been. It was shipped for UK and delivered in the UK, so it would have been reasonable to expect a UK plug...
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hardisty

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and good price
customer_reviews.text: Great screen for the price with good picture, does not come with speakers but that is ok with me (less to go wrong). Not the most stable of monitors and a to much plastic and very light weight , but having said that would recommend for the price. I have given 5 stars because of price and I am happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: steviev1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality item for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.. great size picture quality is just as expected. It would have been useful to know that it is supplied with the required leads. This wasn't mentioned in the description and I purchased another. Delivery was late by 2 days but this was due to the delivery company and not to the supplier. ( Tracking information showing it sitting in local hub)..
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Missing stand
customer_reviews.text: It didn't actually have the pillar for the stand. Ie a part was missing that meant I couldn't use as a desk monitor. I had to buy a wall TV mount in addition from a local store. My IT manager brother states most monitors are desk or wall mounted now and original stands throw.. This would be normal practise
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great budget monitor. I have its predecessor , which has annoying "touch" response buttons which are impossible to see, and i noticed they have fixed that in this version with actual buttons. Very simple very effective.
customer_reviews.author: H. Linton

customer_reviews.title: A good small Free view tv.
customer_reviews.text: This tv is good because when you attach headphones to the speaker outlet. You hear surround sound I am not sure about playing games on it. But the picture quality is spot on as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. Liversidge

customer_reviews.title: if you order this monitor and want speakers then put it in capital Letters.
customer_reviews.text: It came without speakers which were clearly shown on the specification.
customer_reviews.author: Positive

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a christmas present to my partner, its had all over good reviews so gave it a try. Image is crisp and clean, it has no issue with fast games and keeps up with movies without any blur. Good little gaming screen, we'll be replacing all our monitors with this eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Stock

customer_reviews.title: No instructions or cables so returned
customer_reviews.text: No cables no controller or instructions returned as unable to use very poor packaging very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jarosi

customer_reviews.title: ISNT HDMI READY
customer_reviews.text: This product is so misleading. it clearly states that it is HDMI READY. It actually isnt. No HDMI port. Very annoyed. They need to re check there advertisement!!
customer_reviews.author: jade mcnamara

customer_reviews.title: Very wobbly stand - monitor shakes
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine apart from the stand the monitor sits on - it wobbles every time you type. I am not talking about excessive force and the desk is level etc. It is just a very flimsy and loose stand so the monitor wobbles the whole time. It is maddening.
customer_reviews.author: m1002

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful 22" PC/Mac monitor - recommended
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an inexpensive 22" monitor, this is it. Doesn't look anything special but equally doesn't look bad at all, it's best feature is it's price really and the fact that it looks respectable and works!! Very bright screen though
customer_reviews.author: T R

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with HDMI port
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as coming with HDMI port when it does not. Screen is ok, works with VGA only. Very average
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Disaster
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived without a correct power cable, VGA lead or paperwork. It looked as if the box had been opened before and "cannibalised". Then there was a dead pixel cluster so the item was returned. But the same day a female from the seller harassed me on the telephone. I had not given the seller my number and cold calling is a criminal offence in the UK. Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Victim

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: My old monitor quit working on me so needed in a hurry. Arrived on time, great size next to my laptop, love it. No stars for gaming as that's not what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Rosimc18

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of time advertised as HDMI no HDMI present on this thing at all. Would never buy off this seller again was my sons birthday present only gave 1 star so I could post this review
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months - useless
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 3 months and burnt out. Appalling customer service from Philips who after 2 months have still failed to fix, replace or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Well packed and easy set up in less than 5 mins. Comes with a UK and Euro plug and VGA cable. Good size and picture for the money. Tilt adjustment is firm and remains in the chosen position. You will need to tinker with your sound cards settings to get the best from the somewhat tinny speakers. Picture out the box was a light bright for my liking but like everything else with the monitor this was easily altered.
customer_reviews.author: Swanny

customer_reviews.title: Great kit delivered quickly at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality piece of kit. Instantly set up. Looks good too. Very happy with it. Delivered quickly and good value. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: ChiefChicken

customer_reviews.title: Good wfh monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great for my newly set up work from home desk. I have two of these attached to a laptop docking station and they've been great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has the wrong description, it says it has a built in camera which it doesn't . and the pictures show it having a HDMI socket which it doesn't have which is why i have given it 4 stars and not 5.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Heenan

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen, but broken pixels
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, and seamlessly connected to a macbook via a USB-C to HDMI cable bought separately. Decent screen quality for the (cheap) price. BUT, there is a line of pixels from top to bottom of the screen (about 5mm wide) that doesn't work. To avoid the hassle of returning it we are keeping the product and living with the faulty picture, but I expected more from Philips and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: R A Cant

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and install.
customer_reviews.text: Very good monitor. Picture nice and sharp. Very easy to set up and connect to PC. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: very good monitor. A bit bigger than expected as i struggle to understand screen measurement works beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Cepoy

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: By no means perfect, gets the job done. Stand is very restrictive and not too easy to set up. Good value though.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Very Pleased with it. Just right for the small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen robinson

customer_reviews.title: Brill monitor for my needs. Service and prompt delivery excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monoitor. Prompt delivery and service. Makes working from home so much easier for me with a laptop n monitor connected. Thku.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: reliable
customer_reviews.text: works ok purchased in 2016 and since handed it down to other family but its still in use on a daily basis, no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while now and it works nicely. No problems at all!
customer_reviews.author: Bookreader

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Trying to adjust the colour/brightness etc is pretty much impossible!
customer_reviews.author: V. Cufalo

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising - description bares no relevance to what facilities are on device
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be false advertising. The specification mentions built in camera, audio and HD. This far from the case it is a basic vga monitor with no sound or camera. Looks like a bait and switch!! Promised call back to discuss none received.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Ross

customer_reviews.title: Keep it clean wipe the screen with optical cleanser regularly
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I have purchased they are used to monitor my cctv activities and thus far have had no problems picture clarity very good 😃
customer_reviews.author: The Hobbitt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It so clear compared to my old one. It is the perfect size I feel.
customer_reviews.author: Vikinglady

customer_reviews.title: Neat Widescreen Monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up using HDMI input, screen definition good, pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ian s elliott

customer_reviews.title: Sent back for refund
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor but it had a faulty mains connection within the monitors casing. Sent it back and got a re fund.
customer_reviews.author: R. T. Usher

customer_reviews.title: Awful image quality - blurry hurting eyes
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the image proved to be awful. After few hours of use, my eyes hurt me. No resolution comes clean, the image is blurry. Got it a used one from Amazon warehouse, don't know if it was a flawed one. Save your eyes and spend a couple of bucks more.
customer_reviews.author: LE POETVIN Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality screen and was defective out of the box with a line of yellow pixels. Whilst this was a budget prices product the image quality could not be adjusted to obtain a satisfactory picture. Now costing me £ to return product which is an insult to injury ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Lovely style monitor, colour production good. Arrived on time in good packaging. Very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not quite but great recovery
customer_reviews.text: Great service from the supplier, product came without a U.K. plug which initially disappointed me. The supplier rectified this as soon as they realised and without being contacted. Great customer service Thankyou ! Product is fine and just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: LOVED THIS MONITOR VERY GOOD QUALITY ONLY THING I FOUND THAT I DIDNT LIKE WAS THE NARRATOR BUT FOUND THE OFF BUTTON VERY QUICK.
customer_reviews.author: christine tizzard

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great second hand item. Works perfect for a quick working from home fix
customer_reviews.author: Mrs G Hodges

customer_reviews.title: ok... just ok!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job as a cheap monitor however be warned the viewing angles are terrible!
customer_reviews.author: GTL

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as a tv not screen monitors
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a tv , not a screen Minuit description wrong
customer_reviews.author: anni hampton

customer_reviews.title: Even on the highest brightness setting, the display is too dark.
customer_reviews.text: Even on the highest brightness setting, the display is too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie G

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this due to working from home and Covid as this was a reasonable size for the price its just cheap built cheap everything but thats what you get for 80 pounds. so it will do for spreadsheets and powerpoints.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Using on desk so not squinting at laptop screen. It's a good size for this
customer_reviews.author: Alison Parker

customer_reviews.title: The picture is fine. My old monitor failed I just wanted a ...
customer_reviews.text: Screen does not tilt far enough back, I have to wedge up the front of the support foot with a piece of wood to get the viewing angle right for me. The screen aspect is a bit wide but had I time to get into the instructions this could probably be changed. The picture is fine. My old monitor failed I just wanted a medium size monitor screen to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only has VGA port and bad screen quality
customer_reviews.text: I received this monitor yesterday and it was working fine on the day but the picture quality wasn't great. I tried turning it on this morning and it won't turn on at all. It broke within a day...
customer_reviews.author: Harry Edore

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: great product for the money, if the sockets where easier to get at it would be a 5, minor pain.
customer_reviews.author: roy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The price was excellent, does the job monitoring cctv cameras
customer_reviews.author: Cazbee

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv works well
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Have used it in the caravan. Works as it shoils
customer_reviews.author: Lizard

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is adequate for my needs, but the stand is very flimsy, the on/off button is at right hand side and when switching you need a hand on top to stop the monitor falling over
customer_reviews.author: Mr S Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Whoever forgot to pack the stand for the monitor your dumb
customer_reviews.text: No stand came with the monitor how am I supposed to use this without a stand that is meant to be with it?. Dopey person didn't even think to put the stand for it while packing it.
customer_reviews.author: sean michaels

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor for £54!!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, I only got it for £54 as a used one that wasn’t in its original packing but it was still fine and had no problems (marks, pixel damage or structural damage. I would recommend that you get this as a used if u can, big there is no audio jack on the monitor! But would recommend
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Practical basic monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a warehouse deal. Not bad for price. Screen size is just about ok for surveilance camera setup.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: WISHY WASHY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I worked for Philips for nearly 25 years and would have rejected this screen as poor quality and also an incorrect brightness. level Maybe gaming users would disagree with me.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Arnold Fox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good screen, speakers aren't HiFi, surround sound, but perfect for what I need, CCL service good too.
customer_reviews.author: S-Met

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, bit wobbly
customer_reviews.text: The monitor was very easy to set up and use, the only down side is that the stand isn't very sturdy or heavy meaning the monitor wobbles quite a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dawn Foster

customer_reviews.title: These monitors are really good I bought two but one has a single picsal ...
customer_reviews.text: These monitors are really good I bought two but one has a single picsal faulty, I didn’t want the hassle of sending it back just for that so have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Gaunts

customer_reviews.title: Incorrectly advertised
customer_reviews.text: The item does not come with a hdmi port which is advertised on the site, requires an adapted if hdmi is needed. Please change the image so other people dont have this problem
customer_reviews.author: Kenan

customer_reviews.title: means I have to prop the front up in order to see it easily at head height on a desk
customer_reviews.text: Biggest problem is it only tilts 10 degrees. means I have to prop the front up in order to see it easily at head height on a desk. Surely 20 degrees of tilt would be better. Paul
customer_reviews.author: branwen

customer_reviews.title: great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as second screen for working from home and for the price I am really impressed with the picture quality and overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C

customer_reviews.title: Great unit;
customer_reviews.text: Lovely Desk top Monitor, Nice size and good picture, plenty of adjustments can be made to suit your preferences, Also good back up services from philips; (Well worthy for The Price)::
customer_reviews.author: Mike Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. Perfect when attached to laptop. Great picture quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TAZLAW

customer_reviews.title: Bargain buy
customer_reviews.text: Instant install on Linux Ubuntu good colours and easy adjust
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. D. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived the next day. Perfect size exactly as described. Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Despicableminionpurple

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great little monitor for gaming or just browsing the net, works great
customer_reviews.author: gemma mather

customer_reviews.title: great picture. Sound not brilliant but that's not why ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely monitor, great picture. Sound not brilliant but that's not why we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Working from home
customer_reviews.text: Good size screen, makes working with a surface pro easier on the eye. Good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its cheap..but not very good...may have to spend a bit more
customer_reviews.text: Home office working, but display is very poor, looks like I am trying to view it without my glasses on!
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Terrible screen quality
customer_reviews.text: So washed out I couldn't use it. I returned it and bought a different monitor immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Olaf

customer_reviews.title: Only issue would be that the sound quality could be better, and it is very complicated to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Screen is large enough to keep a number of documents open at once, which is what I needed. Only issue would be that the sound quality could be better, and it is very complicated to adjust. Too much bass, a bit echoey, and sounds hollow.
customer_reviews.author: Early Bird

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: This is very old and will need extra for connection to any thing. Best to buy a more updated item
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Warsop

customer_reviews.title: Philips 223V5LHSB2/00 21.5 -Inch LCD/LED Monitor DOES NOT include embedded speakers for HDMI input
customer_reviews.text: Tha is the minimum add-on we whould expect from HDMI compatible monitor
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Monitor came with the wrong power cable
customer_reviews.text: Product came with the wrong power cable, meaning I had to buy a separate cable.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Carver

customer_reviews.title: Shocking
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and the screen was cracked. Appalled with the quality of the product. Why has it not been quality checked?
customer_reviews.author: M. Baldock

customer_reviews.title: Wrong AC cable!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with UK AC cable. Lucky I had a spare one. Ok for analogue cctv. But still not fit for purpose if EU power cable sent.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: The sound is not great though and screen brightness cannot be dimmed enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a large sized monitor that works well. The sound is not great though and screen brightness cannot be dimmed enough to work in low light settings.
customer_reviews.author: Tayyaub mansoor

customer_reviews.title: nice monitor, good for gamming the only problem its ...
customer_reviews.text: nice monitor , good for gamming the only problem its the 85hz because its working in 60hz
customer_reviews.author: Eugen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Screen is fine once it heats up there is a constant humming noise from it.
customer_reviews.author: David Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Great value screen
customer_reviews.text: Great value screen. Better sound would lift it to a 5, but for the money, very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but its Good!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the cheapest 19.5 Monitor . Although it just has VGA . but its Good!
customer_reviews.author: sameerul

customer_reviews.title: good colour, using it for work purposes and its
customer_reviews.text: Clear screen, good colour, using it for work purposes and its excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, presence of just 1 HDMI port may be an issue for some. *Mine included a UK plug*
customer_reviews.text: The monitor worked well with my Macbook (I connected it via a Thunderbolt-to-HDMI cable). The ports available are: 1 x HDMI, 1 x DVI, 1 x D-SUB (DE-15/VGA), Audio In & Headphone Jack The presence of only 1 HDMI output may be a problem for some but is manageable for me. The inbuilt stereo speakers are a nice bonus. Included in the box: UK plug, US plug, DE-15 cable, 3.5mm audio cable. HDMI cable not included.
customer_reviews.author: R Sherwood

product_meta.title: Philips 193V5LSB2 18.5 Inch LCD/LED Monitor - Black (1366 x 768 @ 60 Hz) VGA
product_meta.description:
Style Name:VGA| Size Name:18.5 Inch

Enjoy vivid LED pictures on this Philips display. Equipped with Smart Control Lite.

Smart Control Lite is an enhanced 3D icon based GUI monitor control software. This allows user to fine-tune most parameters of the monitor like colour, brightness, screen calibration, multi-media, ID management, etc with the mouse.

Smart contrast is a Philips technology that study the contents you are displaying, automatically adjusting colour and controlling backlight intensity to dynamically enhance contrast for the ideal digital images and videos or when playing games where dark hues are displayed. When economy mode is selected, contrast is adjusted and backlighting fine-tuned for just right display of everyday office applications and lower power consumption.

. Mounting type: VESA mount (100x100mm). Connectivity: VGA only

BOX CONTAINS
Monitor with stand / VGA / power
feature_bullets: LED technology for vivid colours. Plug & Play Compatibility-DDC/CI, Mac OS X, sRGB,Windows 7,Windows 8
Easy display performance tuning with Smart Control Lite
Glossy and mercury free display design. MTBF : 30,000 hours
Product comes with both EU and UK Plug, EU Plug at the top and UK plug at the down side. Please ensure to check entire package
